description: a(n) = smallest prime p such that p*n! + 1 is prime.
formula: Analogous to or subset of A051686; generalization of A005384
mathematica: Do[k = 1; While[ !PrimeQ[ Prime[k]*n! + 1], k++ ]; Print[ Prime[k]], {n, 1, 75} ]
author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 15 1999
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 16 1999
